mapper.sql: id, update_url, content, fk_op_platform_id, forced_update, file_size, app_version, show_dialog, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, versions, del, remark
mapper.select: select sv.id as id, sv.app_version as appVersion, sv.fk_op_platform_id as fkOpPlatformId, op.type as platformName, sv.forced_update as forcedUpdate, sv.content as content, sv.update_url as updateUrl, sv.insert_time as insertTime, sv.update_time as updateTime from sys_version sv left join op_platform op ON sv.fk_op_platform_id = op.id where 1 = 1 AND sv.del = '0' AND op.type = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sv.insert_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_version (id, update_url, content, fk_op_platform_id, forced_update, file_size, app_version, show_dialog, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, versions, del, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkOpPlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{forcedUpdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showDialog,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{del,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_version
update_url = #{updateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_op_platform_id = #{fkOpPlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
forced_update = #{forcedUpdate,jdbcType=CHAR},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
show_dialog = #{showDialog,jdbcType=CHAR},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert_admin = #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
versions = #{versions,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del = #{del,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_version set update_url = #{updateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_op_platform_id = #{fkOpPlatformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, forced_update = #{forcedUpdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_dialog = #{showDialog,jdbcType=CHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_admin = #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, versions = #{versions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del = #{del,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
